Package attomenu

Class MenuItem

java.lang.Object
attomenu.MenuItem
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class MenuItem
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
Associates menu text with a response when selected.

A character key may be optionally specified for selecting this MenuItem object. If omitted, a numeric key will be generated instead.

MenuItem is philisophically similar to Swing's JMenuItem, except that MenuItem relies on Runnable rather than ActionListener for the response.

When printed, MenuItem prints the menuText. Calling run() invokes the menuResponse.

Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
Professor George F. Rice
See Also:
Menu
Licensed under:
Gnu General Public License 3.0

  • Constructor Details

    • MenuItem

      public MenuItem​(java.lang.Object menuText, java.lang.Runnable menuResponse, char key)
      Initializes a MenuItem object with an optional character key.
      Parameters:
      menuText - Text to display when the menu is printed
      menuResponse - Object that delegates to the menu item response
      key - Alternate character to select this menu item
      Since:
      1.1

    • equals

      public boolean equals​(java.lang.Object obj)
      Compares the specified object with this menuItem for equality.

      Returns true if and only if the specified object is also a MenuItem and the menuText and menuResponse are equal.

      Overrides:
      equals in class java.lang.Object
